title: The Nord Stream Truth You Won’t Hear on MSM with Colonel Douglas Macgregor
itunes:title: The Nord Stream Truth You Won’t Hear on MSM with Colonel Douglas Macgregor
description:
With all the speculation surrounding the Nord Stream sabotage, Charlie brings in one of the country's top experts on military engagement, counterterrorism and geopolitics— Retired U.S. Army Colonel Douglas Macgregor, to ask him point blank what he thinks happened, and who did it? This is quite literally, everything you need to know about Nord Stream, the Ukrainian War, and what Putin plans to do next. Then, Turning Point Action COO Tyler Bowyer joins the program to explain what the average American can do to help get their outspent, America-First candidates over the finish line in November.

Support the show: http://www.charliekirk.com/support

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
